name: PetsHealthTipsandTricks
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Taking care of our pets is not only our obligation; it is also our way of showing them that we love and care for them. Taking care of your pet does not mean just giving them their meals everyday. Pets have emotions too and they need to be noticed, played with and trained. They need to know that their owners care for them.

There are lots of ways that you can show your care for your pet. For first time owners, you can learn about this ways so that you would be ready.

Recent revelations in scientific research have provided pet owners with the means to now save their beloved family pets from injuries and diseases that would have caused the pet to be euthanized in the not so distant past. 

Enable our skill and stay updated with the latest news , discoveries, tips and tricks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
